articles.title: Posters of People's Art Festival Produced
articles.content:
Posters of People's Art Festival Produced 
						
 Pyongyang April 5 (KCNA) -- Posters of the Fourth April Spring People's Art Festival were produced in the DPRK to mark the significant Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Written "The Fourth April Spring People's Art Festival," the posters depict the festival logo and the festival period.
					
					 Posters dealing with the fields of art troupes and art squads portray the artistes singing high praises of the revolutionary career and undying feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and discharging their revolutionary duties in giving full play to the might of the Juche-based literature and arts in the new era under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 There are posters dealing with the fields of itinerant art squads and art groups dynamically conducting art agitation for increased production.

articles.title: Regional Body Censures THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
Regional Body Censures THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization released a statement on Mar. 31 denouncing the U.S. moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 The U.S., trumpeting about "threat" from missiles of the DPRK more noisily than ever before, openly revealed its ulterior design to introduce THAAD into south Korea.
					
					 The U.S., by deploying THAAD in south Korea, is seeking to round off preparations for a preemptive attack on the DPRK and create favorable conditions to contain the strategic rivals China and Russia, pursuant to its strategy for dominating the world.
					
					 The projected deployment of THAAD is also prompted by its strategic purpose to form U.S.-Japan-south Korea alliance, the Asian-version NATO and round off a global missile defence network at any cost.
					
					 In case THAAD is deployed in south Korea, it will establish a new Cold War structure in Northeast Asia and the Korean peninsula will be exposed to the increased danger of being reduced to a theatre of war by big powers.
					
					 The Afro-Asia People's Solidarity Organization vehemently denounces the U.S. moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea at any cost.
					
					 We urge the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to think twice.

articles.title: KFA Urges Japan to Make Reparation for Its Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
KFA Urges Japan to Make Reparation for Its Human Rights Abuses
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association (KFA) headquartered in Spain made public a statement on March 30 as regards the fact that the Japanese police authorities searched houses of officials of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The KFA bitterly denounces the Japanese Police Agency for hurling an armored car and dozens of policemen into searching the houses of Chairman Ho Jong Man and Vice-Chairman Nam Sung U of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee on March 26.
					
					 There is neither right nor reason for the agency to search their houses as they are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 Such violence was prompted by a sinister design to seize information about Chongryon and tarnish its image.
					
					 Japan should not indict the DPRK but make an apology and reparation to all victims of its systematic human rights abuses committed during its colonial occupation of Korea for over four decades.
					
					 If Japan fails to do so, it will be rejected by its neighboring countries in Asia and be forced to pay dearly for its unreasonable act.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Censured by Bulgarian Political Party
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Censured by Bulgarian Political Party
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Bulgarian Communists Union released a statement on March 30 to denounce the Japanese reactionaries for cracking down on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 There is in Japan Chongryon which plays the role of a diplomatic mission of the DPRK.
					
					 Chongryon has been constantly persecuted and suppressed by the Japanese authorities.
					
					 Recently they worked hard to seize the Central Hall of Chongryon, the base of its activities.
					
					 This time they conducted illegal and unprecedented search for the houses of officials of Chongryon on the sheer conspiratorial pretext that it is linked with the violation of the "foreign exchange law".
					
					 This proves that Japan is not opting for improving relations with the DPRK but taking a quite different road.
					
					 What the Japanese authorities are doing is a harmful act of bedeviling the relations with the DPRK and disturbing the security in the Asia-Pacific region and the global peace.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon.

articles.title: Japanese Government Urged to Stop Crackdown on Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Government Urged to Stop Crackdown on Chongryon 
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Bulgaria and Austria issued statements on March 30 in protest against the Japanese authorities' reckless suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said:
					
					 Chongryon is a dignified organization protecting the democratic national rights of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The recent repressive action of Japan clearly proves that it is not reflecting on the crimes it committed against the Korean people in the past, after throwing off even the mask of the "law-governed state" and "democratic state," oblivious of the lesson taught by history still now nearly 70 years since its defeat in the war.
					
					 We strongly demand the Japanese authorities stop at once the suppression of Koreans in Japan, apologize for the past crimes and stop joining the U.S. in its moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The Youth Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in a state of Austria noted:
					
					 The Japanese government is to wholly blame for the search for the houses of officials of Chongryon.
					
					 The recent action will seriously affect the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 We urge the Japanese government to stop acting rashly and make an honest apology.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Moves against DPRK and Chongryon Denounced by Ecuadorian, Nigerian Bodies
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Moves against DPRK and Chongryon Denounced by Ecuadorian, Nigerian Bodies
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Library and the Juche Youth Group of Ecuador and the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association released a joint statement on Mar. 30 in protest against the Japanese reactionaries' brigandish acts against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Kim Jong Il Library and the Juche Youth Group noted:
					
					 Chongryon is a legitimate overseas citizens' organization representing the DPRK and the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee whose houses were searched are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK. 
					
					 Therefore, the search is a violation of human rights of Koreans in Japan and, at the same time, a challenge and provocation against the DPRK, a dignified socialist state, and an expression of hostile policy toward it.
					
					 Strongly denouncing the Japanese authorities' hostile acts against the DPRK and violation of human rights of Koreans in Japan, we demand them fully ensure the legitimate activities of Chongryon and its exercise of independent right.
					
					 We extend support and solidarity to the struggle of Chongryon to defend the dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association in a statement termed the search committed in broad daylight in Japan styling itself a "law-governed state" and "democratic state" an unprecedentedly illegal investigation that offended even the constitution and the criminal procedure law of Japan.  
					
					 The statement urged the Japanese authorities to make an apology and reparation for the untold inhuman crimes committed by Japan against Koreans during its military occupation over Korea for decades in the past century and to stop at once the suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Denounced by British Organizations
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Denounced by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on Mar. 30 in protest against the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 We express bitter indignation at the violence the Japanese authorities committed by hurling huge police troops into searching the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 The search is an illegal repressive act against the legitimate overseas citizens' organization protecting the interests of Koreans in Japan and representing the DPRK and an undisguised act hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities, by committing such violence, self-revealed that Japan is, indeed, human rights tundra where national discrimination is rampant and the spirit of Samurai is reviving.
					
					 The crackdown upon Chongryon once again clearly proved that Japan is a shock brigade of the U.S. imperialists in Asia and the Japanese politics are further lurching to right and fascism as the case was timed to coincide with the offensive kicked off by the U.S. and its allies against the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities, stop suppressing Chongryon at once!

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Should Make Apology to DPRK Government and Chongryon: Kyrgyz Political Party
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Should Make Apology to DPRK Government and Chongryon: Kyrgyz Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan released a joint statement on Mar. 31 in protest against the Japanese authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 On March 26, the Japanese police authorities committed a fascist violence of searching the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 Chongryon is a legitimate overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK that makes every effort for the development of good neighborly and friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries while playing the role of a diplomatic mission of the DPRK in Japan in the absence of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 The illegal search clearly showed that the bad blood of the Japanese authorities toward the DPRK and the Korean people has reached a dangerous phase.
					
					 The People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan strongly censure the Japanese authorities for their crackdown on Chongryon.
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities to make an apology to the government of the DPRK and Chongryon and punish those responsible.

articles.title: Austrian Body to Actively Conduct Movement for Supporting Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Austrian Body to Actively Conduct Movement for Supporting Korea's Reunification 
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria released a statement on Mar. 31 in support of the appeal made by the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 Extending support to the appeal calling for furthering the international solidarity movement for independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the statement noted:
					
					 It is necessary to put an end to the division of Korea inflicting all sorts of misfortune and pain upon the Korean people.
					
					 We will make our every effort for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 The war drills targeting the DPRK should be stopped at once in order to provide a foundation for dialogue to bring about peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 All those who are thrown into prisons for the reason that they staged actions for peaceful reunification of the country should be released.
					
					 We will make a positive contribution to further intensifying international solidarity activities supporting the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the 35th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Nakhodka, Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Nakhodka, Russia
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Nakhodka, Russia on March 31.
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and undying feats of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 A lecture took place in Angola, film show in Guinea and photo exhibition in South Africa between March 25 and 31.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos dealing with the sacred revolutionary career and undying feats of the President.
					
					 Also on display there were photos showing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched Korean film "Kimilsungia." 
					
					 The general director of a business group of Angola said in a lecture that the President dynamically advanced the Korean revolution under the unfurled banner of the Juche idea and built socialism centered on the popular masses, thus instilling conviction and courage into the world progressives and positively supporting and encouraging their struggle.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President was a close friend of the Angolan people and the great leader recognized by the world.
					
					 The Korean people will register greater successes in building a thriving nation under the wise guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the President.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association said that Kimilsungia going by the august name of the great man who indicated the way to be followed by mankind with the sunrays of Juche would always remain in full bloom with the era of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Austrian Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Austrian Body on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on its website on April 1.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), deals with the historic position of Kimilsungia and significance of its cultivation and indicates the tasks for bringing the flower of the sun, a treasure common to mankind, into full bloom everywhere in Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Carried by U.S. Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Carried by U.S. Paper
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The gist of "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu", a letter sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to those attending the 7th National Conference of Sportspeople, was carried by a U.S. paper on March 27.
					 The work, published on Mar. 25, Juche 104 (2015), deals with the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea is channeling great efforts into the sports field in order to develop the nation's sports true to President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's Juche-based idea and intention of developing sports.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks and ways of successfully implementing the party's plan for building a sports power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Peru on March 31.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives and indicates tasks for firmly preserving and upholding and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.
